success.title: Congratulations! You have successfully booked your ticket.
success.content: We have sent a payment information email to your inbox.
success.content_0: The seat will be temporarily reserved once you complete the booking process and will only be confirmed after you complete the payment within 15 minutes of receiving the payment information email.
success.content_1: After 15 minutes, if the Organizer does not receive payment, the seat will return to an available status.
success.content_2: If you still haven't received a confirmation email after 15 minutes, please check your spam folder or contact us for assistance.
